law.catch_line: NOTICE OF AND APPEALS FROM DECISION OF AGENCIES.

section.text: Notice of recommendation not to issue a license under this chapter or to revoke a license shall be given to the licensee. Administrative appeals shall be, first, to the Director of Finance and then to the City Manager. An appeal of a decision to recommend the revocation of a license shall suspend the operation of that decision. (Code 1959 , §4-48)
